txt.en: Glóin can be found in the keep of Annâk-khurfu.\n\nGlóin has asked you to aid him and his scouts in securing the approach to Mount Gundabad.
Glóin has sent several scouts into Elderslade to aid the Gabil'akkâ in securing the approach to Mount Gundabad.
Glóin can be found in the keep of Annâk-khurfu.\n\nGlóin has asked you to aid him and his scouts in securing the approach to Mount Gundabad.

'By order of Prince Durin, I have sent a number of my scouts across Elderslade to prepare the way for the Gabil'akkâ.

'None of us know what awaits us at Mount Gundabad, and it is a fool's hope to think Gorgar the Ruthless is not also keenly aware of that fact.

'You are a skilled warrior, a practised adventurer, and wise to the dangers that lurk in unexplored territory. And so, I would have you aid my scouts, [placeholder].'

'Well done!

'Thanks to you, my scouts have returned to Annâk-khurfu no worse for the wear. The Gabil'akkâ stand ready to march on Mount Gundabad.

'I count myself fortunate to have you at my side, [placeholder]. Let us see what tomorrow brings!'
